channel.title: Need help to edit my server
channel.description:
yes hello i am trying to edit my server so if u has seen my other post when i get it working online it will be working so
im useing testscape source nd i wanna change it so the dummie thing across the road doesnt work nd they cnt cheat by using that so i either wanna delete it or i wanna lock the door shut ?? any ideas of umm
also i wanna change it from when u kill some one u dont gain like 50 levels from kill some lvl2 but so its the proper exp when u kill some one any other ideas thanks u can either email me on rox_sox12@hotmail.com with the ideas or just post a quike reply or something thanks for the help ( as u can tell im a noob nd no nothin about programming all help is much appriciated
